original: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyā maṇḍo, akampiyaṭṭhena balā maṇḍo, niyyānaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā
analyzed: ādhipateyya ṭṭhena indriyāḥ maṇḍaḥ akampiya ṭṭhena balāḥ maṇḍaḥ niyyāna ṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā

original: maṇḍo, hetuṭṭhena maggo maṇḍo, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satipaṭṭhānā maṇḍo, padahanaṭṭhena
analyzed: maṇḍaḥ hetu ṭṭhena maggaḥ maṇḍaḥ upaṭṭhāna ṭṭhena sati paṭṭhānā maṇḍaḥ padahana ṭṭhena

original: sammappadhānā maṇḍo, ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhipādā maṇḍo, tathaṭṭhena saccā maṇḍo, avikkhepaṭṭhena
analyzed: sammappadhānāḥ maṇḍaḥ ijjhana ṭhena iddhipādāḥ maṇḍaḥ tatha ṭhena saccāḥ maṇḍaḥ avikkhepa ṭṭhena

original: samatho maṇḍo, anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā maṇḍo, ekarasaṭṭhena samathavipassanā maṇḍo,
analyzed: samathaḥ maṇḍaḥ anupassana ṭṭhena vipassanā maṇḍaḥ ekarasa ṭṭhena samatha vipassanā maṇḍaḥ

original: anativattanaṭṭhena yuganaddhā maṇḍo, saṁvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhi maṇḍo, avikkhepaṭṭhena
analyzed: an ativattana ṭhena yuganaddhā maṇḍo savara ṭṭhena sīla visuddhi maṇḍo avikkhepa ṭṭhena

original: cittavisuddhi maṇḍo, dassanaṭṭhena diṭṭhivisuddhi maṇḍo, muttaṭṭhena vimokkho maṇḍo,
analyzed: citta visuddhi maṇḍaḥ dassana ṭṭhena diṭṭhi visuddhi maṇḍaḥ mutta ṭṭhena vimokkho maṇḍaḥ

original: paṭivedhaṭṭhena vijjā maṇḍo, pariccāgaṭṭhena vimutti maṇḍo, samucchedaṭṭhena khaye
analyzed: paṭivedha ṭṭhena vijjā maṇḍo pariccāga ṭṭhena vimutti maṇḍo samuccheda ṭṭhena khaye

original: ñāṇaṁ maṇḍo, paṭippassaddhaṭṭhena anuppāde ñāṇaṁ maṇḍo, chando mūlaṭṭhena maṇḍo,
analyzed: ñāṇam maṇḍo paṭippassaddha ṭṭhena anuppāde ñāṇam maṇḍo chandaḥ mūla ṭṭhena maṇḍo

original: manasikāro samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena maṇḍo, phasso samodhānaṭṭhena maṇḍo, vedanā samosaraṇaṭṭhena
analyzed: manasikāro samuṭṭhāna ṭhena maṇḍaḥ phasso samodhāna ṭhena maṇḍaḥ vedanā samosaraṇa ṭhena

original: maṇḍo, samādhi pamukhaṭṭhena maṇḍo, sati ādhipateyyaṭṭhena maṇḍo, paññā taduttaraṭṭhena
analyzed: maṇḍo samādhi pamukha ṭṭhena maṇḍo sati ādhipateyya ṭṭhena maṇḍo paññā tad uttara ṭṭhena

original: maṇḍo, vimutti sāraṭṭhena maṇḍo, amatogadhaṁ nibbānaṁ pariyosānaṭṭhena maṇḍoti.
analyzed: maṇḍaḥ vimutti sāra ṭṭhena maṇḍaḥ amatogadham nibbānam pariyosāna ṭṭhena maṇḍaḥ ti

original: Esa nikāyadharehi ṭhapito, asamo paṭhamo pavaro varavaggoti.
analyzed: esa nikāya dharehi ṭhapitaḥ asamaḥ paṭhamaḥ pavaraḥ vara vaggo ti
